body:
# State of the Repo Report, January 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics Ã¢ÂÂ enjoy! Ã°ÂÂ¤Â

The "median open pull request" adds 53 lines, removes 15 lines and touches 4 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 46 928 lines, removes 16 341 lines and touches 1 515 distinct files.

The repo contains 463 566 lines of text and 1 638 files.

There are currently 243 open pull requests from in total 79 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 7%.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, December 2018](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/14899)
